alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 10 at 5:28PM EDT until July 12 at 1:41AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central and southern New Hampshire, including the following counties, in central New Hampshire, Sullivan. In southern New Hampshire, Cheshire. * WHEN...Until 830 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 528 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Charlestown, Alstead, Gilsum, Surry, Walpole, Marlow, Sullivan, Westmoreland and Stoddard.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. It is important to know where you are relative to streams, rivers, or creeks which can become killers in heavy rains. Campers and hikers should avoid streams or creeks.
